title: AskyBlock插件空岛自然不生成怪物 怪物蛋能放出来
author: Carpente
txt_content: 在线等 挺急的 试过诅咒之土和刷怪笼 就连电动刷怪笼都没用

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
打开你的ASkyBlock的配置文件，找到下面段落
  # The following are recommended to be false at spawn, but you can change
  allowbreakblocks: false
  allowplaceblocks: false
  allowredstone: false
  allowanimalkilling: false
  allowmobspawn: false复制代码

将allowmobspawn: false改成allowmobspawn: true
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content: 删除空岛配置文件夹，重启服务器即可
